cards.name: Alongside
cards.description: The colours of the nature changes constantly and similarly in human life the circumstances also keep changing. The reflection in the water represents the inner feelings of human reflecting through their behaviour.
cards.author: @Smita Rane

cards.name: Water color painting
cards.description: Envision a tranquil water color painting that transports you to a picturesque valley, a serene escape from the daily hustle.
cards.author: @chirag_bansale

cards.name: Pickled together graphic T-Shirt
cards.description: Your beloved studio in a jar, on your back, on a shirt. This classic graphic tee has a fun illustration depicting members of your team, you bet it’ll look good on you and the graphic is strategically placed at the back so you don’t have to awkwardly watch people admire the front of your shirt.
cards.author: @Thuli Chishi

cards.name: Graffiti Grunge
cards.description: Thrilling fusion of two iconic street art forms, channeling the raw energy of grunge textures and the rebellious spirit of graffiti-style outlines. These sharp, dynamic lines draw you into a world of urban expression, where rules are meant to be broken, and creativity knows no bounds.
cards.author: @csjasweth

cards.name: Balloon Koons
cards.description: A whimsical tribute to Jeff Koons, this T-shirt design playfully incorporates typography inspired by his iconic 'Balloon Dog' sculpture. A wearable masterpiece, it seamlessly blends pop art with typographic flair for a fun visual experience.
cards.author: @csjasweth

cards.name: Soar together graphic T-Shirt
cards.description: Back PrintThe hot air balloon is not just a vessel; it's a symbol of unity and togetherness. Balloon’s  basket representing how different people in the studio come together with a sense of joy and camaraderie. Enjoy this vibrant artwork for yourself or your loved ones this Give season
cards.author: @chirag_bansal

cards.name: The last catch
cards.description: In the fading light of day, the last catch of a fisherman tells the story of patience, resilience, and nature's bounty. Each fish, a glimpse into the ebb and flow of life's treasures, cradled by the hands that honor the sea's wisdom.
cards.author: @Kishor C

cards.name: Ganga Ghat
cards.description: Capture the soul of Udaipur's Ganga Ghat at dawn in this photograph. The scene unfolds in a symphony of beauty. The tranquil river mirrors the vivid dawn sky, inviting exploration through captivating reflections and graceful flurry of birds.
cards.author: @csjasweth

cards.name: Retro Role
cards.description: Marrying grunge textures with retro outlines, this T-shirt design is a timeless masterpiece—edgy and nostalgic. The lines evoke an era of bold, clean, and iconic design, offering a wearable journey back in time.
cards.author: @csjasweth

cards.name: Together Motif
cards.description: An art piece from the 'postcard' series using motifs and recurring patterns to show a group of people huddling.
cards.author: @Sushant Sharma

cards.name: Inkwell Waves
cards.description: Experience a captivating fusion of typography and fluid elegance—a wearable work of art that mirrors the dynamic spirit of nature. Each letter transforms into a rhythmic wave, capturing the soothing, almost hypnotic essence of the ebb and flow of the ocean.
cards.author: @csjasweth

cards.name: Harmony Note
cards.description: harmonious symphony of typography inspired by the delicate texture and rhythmic flow of musical notes. It's a wearable masterpiece that speaks to the soul of music and design.
cards.author: @csjasweth

cards.name: Your portrait sketch in cross hatching
cards.description: Experience the magic of lines on A4-sized paper as it elevates mortal existence into a paper masterpiece. Dive into the realm of crosshatched portraits, embracing the wonder of lines that delineate your unique presence.
cards.author: @brief_brevity
